WWN.dialog.partySelectHint: Drag and drop characters to add them to the party.
WWN.details.name: 이름
WWN.details.treasureTableHint: Drop a rollable table here to roll the monster treasure
WWN.details.instinctTableHint: Drop a rollable table here to roll an Instinctive Action
WWN.HitDiceFormula: 1레벨의 클래스별 히트 다이스 계산법을 입력하세요 (e.g. 순수 전사라면 '1d6+2')
WWN.AB: 모든 공격 굴림에 추가되는 공격 보너스.
WWN.DB: 모든 피해와 충격에 추가되는 피해 보너스.
WWN.Setting.RerollInitiativeHint: Keep, reset, or reroll initiative each round.
WWN.Setting.MoraleHint: Morale Rating shown on monster sheets.
WWN.Setting.MovementRateHint: 수 없는 세계 혹은 B/X 이동 속도.
WWN.Setting.RandomHPHint: Randomize HP for unlinked tokens when dropped to canvas.
WWN.Setting.showMovementHint: Display a per-turn movement rate, 3x a character's encounter movement.
WWN.Setting.SignificantTreasureHint: Weight at which treasure will reduce the movement, only useful for basic encumbrance
WWN.Setting.xpConfigHint: Set how much experience characters require per level.
WWN.Setting.xpCustomListHint: Enter a list of XP values, separated by commas.
WWN.Setting.hideInstinctHint: If selected, automatic rolls on the Instinct table will be hidden from players.
WWN.items.ShockAC: The AC value under which the weapon inflicts Shock damage. Leave blank for Foci that inflict Shock regardless.
WWN.items.ArmorBonusHint: 갑옷의 기본 아머 클래스에 추가되는 마법적 보너스.
WWN.items.typeTrait: Type a comma separated list of weapon traits: 'Melee,R,2H,Missile (10’ / 20’)' and press ENTER.
WWN.items.ChargeQuantity: Items with charges always have a quantity of 1. Multiples must be represented as separate items.
WWN.items.CurrencyHint: Use WWN coin standards or the full B/X standard.
WWN.items.total.long: Total Silver Value, including all coin and treasure items.
WWN.items.desc.SR: Slow Reload. It takes a Main Action to reload this weapon.
WWN.items.desc.2H: Two Handed. The weapon requires two hands to use in combat. Ranged two-handed weapons cannot be fired effectively while an enemy is within melee range.
WWN.items.desc.AP: Armor Piercing. This weapon ignores non-magical hides, armor and shields for purposes of its hit rolls.
WWN.items.desc.FX: Fixed. The weapon is too heavy and clumsy to use without a fixed position and at least five minutes to entrench it.
WWN.items.desc.L: Long. The weapon is unusually long, allowing melee attacks to be made at targets up to 10 feet distant, even if an ally is in the way. Even so, the wielder still needs to be adjacent to a foe to count as being in melee with them for the puposes of forcing Fighting Withdrawals, disrupting large ranged weapons, or similar maneuvers.
WWN.items.desc.R: Reload. The weapon takes a Move action to reload. If the user has at least Shoot-1 skill, they can reload as an On Turn action instead.
WWN.items.desc.LL: Less Lethal. Foes brought to zero hit points by this weapon can always be left alive at the wielder's discretion.
WWN.items.desc.N: Numerous. Five of these count as only one Readied item.
WWN.items.desc.PM: Precisely Murderous. When used for an Execution Attack, the weapon applies an additional -1 penalty to the Physical save and does double damage even if it succeeds.
WWN.items.desc.S: Subtle. Can be easily hidden in ordinary clothing or concealed in jewelry.
WWN.items.desc.SS: Single Shot. This weapon takes ten rounds to reload, and the reloading effort is spoiled if an enemy melees the wielder.
WWN.items.desc.T: Throwable. While the weapon can be used in melee, it may be thrown out to the listed range as well, albeit it does no Shock in that case. Throwing a weapon while a foe is in melee range applies a -4 penalty to the attack roll.
WWN.items.desc.CB: Crossbow. Due to the simplicity of their operation, someone without Shoot-0 may use a crossbow at no unskilled penalty.
WWN.spells.TimeHint: Length of time effort is committed
WWN.skills.desc.administer: 조직 또는 단체가 돌아가도록 하기, 서류를 관리하기, 계획을 수립하기, 나태하고 반동적인 일꾼을 골라내기, 기록을 분석하기, 중간 관리자가 할 일을 하기.
WWN.skills.desc.connect: 목적을 달성하는 데 필요한 사람들을 찾아내기, 친구를 만들고 지인을 찾아내기, 필요한 작업을 제공할 수 있는 사람을 찾아내기, 소속된 단체에서 지원을 받아내기. 연결은 플레이어 캐릭터가 필요한 사람을 찾아내는 능력이지만, 그들에게서 협력을 받아내기 위해서는 이 이상이 필요할 수 있음.
WWN.skills.desc.convince: 다른 사람에게 자신의 말이 진실임을 믿도록 하기. 일리가 있는 말일수록 믿기가 쉬우며, 설득된 이후에도 예측대로 행동하리라는 보장은 없음.
WWN.skills.desc.craft: 플레이어 캐릭터의 배경과 소속 사회에 걸맞은 기술을 다루고, 물건을 만들거나 수리하기.
WWN.skills.desc.exert: 달리고, 수영하고, 등반하고, 도약하고, 오랜 시간 일하고, 무언가를 던지는 등 육체적인 근력/체력/협응성을 요구하는 일을 하기. 육체 능력치가 낮아도 훈련 또는 경험을 통해 높은 운동 기술을 갖출 수 있음.
WWN.skills.desc.heal: 상처와 병을 치료하고, 독을 중화하고, 정신 건강을 진단하기. 치료 기술은 히트 포인트를 바로 회복할 수는 없지만, 치명상을 입은 동료를 안정화하고 부상을 돌보는 데에 필수적임.
WWN.skills.desc.know: 역사, 지리, 자연과학, 생물학과 같은 학술적 지식.
WWN.skills.desc.lead: 다른 사람들을 지시에 따르게 하고 자신의 계획과 목표를 공유하기.
WWN.skills.desc.magic: 마법을 분석하고 주문을 외우기. 비마법 클래스는 학술적인 지식만을 얻음.
WWN.skills.desc.notice: Notice small details, impending ambushes, hidden features, or concealed objects. Detect subtle smells, sounds, or other sensory input. Notice cannot be used simply to detect a lie, but keen attention can often discern a subject’s emotional state.
WWN.skills.desc.perform: Sing, act, dance, orate, or otherwise perform impressively for an audience. Compose music, plays, writings, or other works of performance art. Most performers will have a particular field they excel at, though polymaths might exist if the PC’s background is appropriate for such versatility.
WWN.skills.desc.pray: Peform the clerical rites of your religion, and be familiar with the gods, demons, and taboos of major and minor faiths, and identify iconography and persons of religious importance. Pray also helps you know the state of local faiths and the important persons in their hierarchies.
WWN.skills.desc.punch: Fight unarmed or with natural body weaponry. Punch, kick, grapple, or otherwise brawl without the benefit of man-made tools. This mode of fighting is inefficient at best without some special Focus to improve it, but it’s reliably non-lethal.
WWN.skills.desc.ride: Ride an animal, drive a cart or carriage, or otherwise deal with land transportation. This skill also includes competence at mount care and tending, basic cart or carriage repair, judging good horseflesh, and other skills appropriate to a beast-rider of whatever society the PC comes from.
WWN.skills.desc.sail: Sail or repair a ship, build small craft, navigate by the stars, read sea weather, manage sailors, and otherwise conduct the business of a professional mariner. This skill may apply to more esoteric means of vehicular travel in some societies.
WWN.skills.desc.shoot: Fire a bow or crossbow or throw a hurled weapon. Maintain ranged weaponry and fletch arrows.
WWN.skills.desc.sneak: Move silently, hide in shadows, avoid notice, pick pockets, disguise yourself, pick locks, defeat traps, or otherwise overcome security measures.
WWN.skills.desc.stab: Fight with melee weapons or throw a hurled weapon. Maintain and identify weaponry.
WWN.skills.desc.survive: Hunt, fish, navigate by the stars, mitigate environmental hazards, identify plants and wildlife, and craft basic survival tools and shelter. A PC’s Survive skill is most pertinent to the environments in their background, but the basic principles can be applied in all but the most alien environments.
WWN.skills.desc.trade: Buy and sell at a profit, identify the worth of goods or treasures, deal with merchants and traders, find black-market goods and services, and know laws regarding smuggling and contraband.
WWN.skills.desc.work: This skill is a catch-all for any profession that might not otherwise merit its own skill, such as a painter, lawyer, farmer, or herdsman. The precise skill it represents will vary with the PC’s background.
WWN.reaction.Hostile: {name} is as aggressively hostile as the situation allows.
WWN.reaction.Unfriendly: {name} is more unfriendly and hostile than they'd be expected to be in the given situation.
WWN.reaction.Neutral: {name} is as predictably hostile or friendly as they'd usually be in this situation.
WWN.reaction.Indifferent: {name} is more friendly and benign than you'd expect them to be, given the circumstances.
WWN.reaction.Friendly: {name} is as friendly and helpful as their nature and the situation permits them to be.

WWN.faction.attackSpecialDesc: Text (with optional inline roll) to show when the asset attacks and counters.
WWN.faction.locationRollDesc: Text (with optional inline roll) to show when the asset is at the same location as attacking or countering asset.
WWN.faction.turnRollDesc: Text (with optional inline roll) to show when the faction has a new turn. This can be for rolls or reminders. By default hidden under the 'long desc'
WWN.faction.abandonGoal: Abandon current goal {name}? Will lose income and no actions this turn.
WWN.faction.action-desc: The following list of actions includes the most common activities a faction might choose to perform. The GM should feel free to add new action types, or allow alternate choices if a faction wishes to do something that doesn't quite fit the list below. As a rule, a faction should only be able to do one thing per turn, but should be able to do that same thing with any or all assets.
